entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
